JMRTD 0.4.4
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.jmrtd

Interface Summary
AuthListener Interface for authentication event observers.
ImageReadUpdateListener Interface for image update observers.
PassportListener Interface for passport insertion and removal observers.
 

Class Summary
AAEvent Event to indicate AA protocol was executed.
BACEvent Event to indicate BAC protocol was executed.
BACKey A BAC key entry.
BACStore Flat file based database for BAC entries.
CSCAStore Certificate store.
CVCAStore Stores terminal CV certificate and keys.
EACEvent Event to indicate EAC protocol was executed.
Passport A passport object is basically a collection of buffered input streams for the data groups, combined with some status information (progress).
PassportApduService Low level card service for sending apdus to the passport.
PassportCertificateGenerator  
PassportEvent Event for passport insertion and removal.
PassportManager Manages passport insertion and removal events.
PassportPersoService Service for initializing blank passport reference applets.
PassportService Card service for reading files (such as data groups) and using the BAC and AA protocols on the passport.
SecureMessagingWrapper Secure messaging wrapper for apdus.
Util Deprecated. The visibility of this class will be changed to package.
